installCommand: npm install && npm run build && php -r "copy('https://getcomposer.org/installer', 'composer-setup.php');" && php composer-setup.php && php -r "unlink('composer-setup.php');" && php composer.phar install --no-dev
buildCommand: php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
